Staten Island Technical High School has been a symbol of excellence in education for over a century. Our mission is to continue and enhance that commitment by providing an environment which will nurture and enhance the special academic talents of the students admitted to Staten Island Tech.

GENERAL DATES

Jun. 02| Ocean Breeze Senior Service
Jun. 04| Faculty Conference
Jun. 12| Senior Day
Jun. 13| Senior Prom
Jun. 26| Last Day Of School
Jun. 26| Senior Graduation

PSAL DATES

Feb. 01| Varsity Wrestling Boys
Feb. 27| Varsity Basketball Boys
Mar. 08| Indoor Track Girls
Sep. 25| Homecoming

PERFOMANCE DATES

Jun. 01| Tri-M Open Mic
Jun. 08| SING Interviews
Jun. 09| Jazzband Concert
